name: Bouncy Balloon (Tuğcan Topaloğlu)
description:
This is a prototype and for educational uses. You can take and check out assets from there: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/tutorials/create-with-code-prototype-3-run-and-jump-146039

Source code and game is given below. You can check out my GitHub too.

Github -> https://github.com/tugcantopaloglu/bouncy-baloon-and-infinite-runner

INSTRUCTIONS

Space -> Balloon goes up.
